## `SetStippleShapeColor`

If using stipple shapes for bars, sets the color for certain shapes.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetStippleShapeColor(string colorNamee)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `string` colorName | The name of the color to use. |
:::
